name: Eagle-Eye Goggles
text: During your attack, gain Advantage on the entire Attack action.

name: Iron Helmet
text: When attacked, consider any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws to be a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

name: Chain Armor
text: During your turn gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the rest of the round

name: Studded Leather
text: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

name: Weathered Boots
text: During your movement add +1 %game.action.move% to a single movement.

name: Winged Shoes
text: During your movement, add %game.action.jump% to the entire Move Action.

name: Heater Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

name: Throwing Hammer
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.condition.stun% to a single attack

name: Poison Dagger
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.poison% to a single attack.

name: Iron Spear
text: During your single-target melee Attack ability, attack any one enemy wihin 2 hexes

name: Healing Potion
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 3, Self" action.

name: Stamina Potion
text: During your turn, return one of your discarded cards to your hand.

name: Power Potion
text: During your attack, add +1 %game.action.attack% to your entire Attack action.

name: Mana Potion
text: During your turn, infuse any one element.

name: Amulet of Life
text: During your turn, "%game.action.heal% 1, Self" action.

name: Robes of Evocation
text: During your attack, %game.element.consume.wild% to add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire Attack action.

name: Comfortable Shoes
text: Whenever you use the default bottom of an ability card, perform a "%game.action.move% 3" action instead of a "%game.action.move% 2" action.

name: Battle-Axe
text: During your single-target melee attack action, turn the attack into the following: *cone_0_1*

name: Black Candle
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.condition.curse% to a single attack.

name: Stun Powder
text: During your attack, add %game.condition.stun% to a single attack.

name: Hawk Helm
text: During your ranged attack, add +1 %game.action.range% to your entire Attack action.

name: Bladed Armor
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack and the attacker suffers 2 damage.

name: Boots of Striding
text: During your movement, add +2 %game.action.move% to a single movement.

name: Volatile Bomb
text: During your single-target ranged attack action, turn the attack into the following: *cone_1_1*

name: Barbed Chain
text: During your ranged attack, add %game.action.pull% 2 to a single attack.

name: Oak Charm
text: During your turn, perform a "BLESS $bless$, %game.action.range:5%" action.

name: Fateful Compass
text: During your turn, force one enemy within %game.action.range:3% to perform a "%game.action.move% 2" action with you controlling the action.

name: Flea-Bitten Shawl
text: You are considered to have an initiative of 99 for the purpose of enemy focusing.

name: Tower Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack.

name: Ring of Haste
text: At the end of your turn, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the bottom action of that card.

name: Ring of Strength
text: During your turn, gain %game.condition.strengthen%.

name: Ring of Restoration
text: During your turn, perform a "%game.action.heal% 3, %game.action.range:5%" action.

name: Steel Ring
text: When damaged by an attack, gain %game.action.shield% 4 for the attack.

name: Barbed Axe
text: During your attack, add %game.condition.wound% to the entire Attack Action.

name: Robes of Command
text: During your turn, one adjacent ally may perform and "%game.action.attack% 2" Action.

name: Jet Boots
text: During your movement, add +1 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump% to a single movement.
